channel.title: Ian Robinson on World Wide Webber
channel.description: Recent content in Ian Robinson on World Wide Webber

item.title: Graph Databases
item.description: The first book on graph databases, now in its second edition. Provides in-depth coverage of graph modeling and querying, as well as thorough explanations of the internal workings of Neo4j.

item.title: The Role of Hypermedia in Distributed System Development
item.description: Demonstrating practical RESTful business protocols with framework support from Restfulie.
